paramDescriptions.label: Name
paramDescriptions.description: Unique identifier for this timer (also used as the internal Statistic name).

paramDescriptions.label: Duration (s)
paramDescriptions.description: Duration in seconds. For countdown: start value. For countup: target/max.

paramDescriptions.label: Auto Start
paramDescriptions.description: If true, starts ticking immediately on Initialize.

paramDescriptions.label: Loop
paramDescriptions.description: If true, resets and restarts when complete.

paramDescriptions.label: Thresholds
paramDescriptions.description: Array of { value, event } objects. Events emitted when value crosses threshold.
